= docker =
== replicatable containers ==
- _$ yay -S docker_

* Docker Guide
  * Notes
    - List running docker images with _$ docker ps_
    - List all docker images with _$ docker ps -a_
    - Start a docker container with _$ docker start $CONTAINER_
    - And restart with _$ docker restart $CONTAINER_
    - Remove an image with _$ docker remove $CONTAINER_
